text: The moment you enter the gate, you are under assault by some unknown psychic force. You spin in the air as though in a glaring blue light. Ahead is an area of darkness - the destination of the gate. Behind, you can still see the distorted image of the area you have just come from: the table of rock, with the jangled edges of the stairway and temple beyond it.

choices.text: Turn back and take the other gate
